thread.title: Prajakta Gharpure
thread.title_full: Zopa Ltd reviewed by Prajakta Gharpure

author: Prajakta Gharpure
title: Prajakta Gharpure
text:
I have had two loans with Zopa so far. One repaid early and the other one on going. Very flexible. Can make more repayments so easily by just clicking through a few buttons online. No need to waste your time by calling them up and arranging this. Rates are competitive as well. Not the lowest that I have received. But am happy! (Better than most banks, Ratesetter or any other peer to peer lending)
Application process ultra simple. Just truthfully enter all your details. Get a personalised Quote: and if you are happy just apply. The money was in my bank within three days! No hassle of signing documents and waiting game. So very happy with the service!
